PHRASE.LANG: PlayStation®Home is one of the last safe havens where it's acceptable and encouraged to wear your PJs all day long. These have the opening in the back too, so no excuses. [#Legal]
PlayStation®Home est l'un des derniers endroits sur Terre où l'on vous encourage à porter un pyjama toute la journée. Il s'ouvre même dans le dos, alors aucune excuse. [#Legal]

PlayStation®Home ist einer der letzten Zufluchtsorte für Menschen, die gerne auch tagsüber im Schlafanzug herumlaufen. Diesen hier kann man sogar hinten aufmachen. Also keine faulen Ausreden! [#Legal]

PlayStation®Home è uno degli ultimi rifugi sicuri dov'è permesso, e invogliato, di vestire il proprio pigiama per tutto il tempo. Questi poi hanno l'apertura sulle spalle, quindi non ci sono scuse. [#Legal]
PlayStation®Home es uno de los últimos refugios seguros donde es aceptable e incluso conveniente llevar el pijama todo el día. Además se abre por detrás, así que no hay excusas. [#Legal]
PlayStation®Home은 하루종일 잠옷을 입어도 되는 최후의 안식처입니다. 이 잠옷은 뒤를 열 수 있기 때문에, 화장실 갈 때도 불편하지 않습니다. [#Legal]
PlayStation®Home is one of the last safe havens where it's acceptable and encouraged to wear your PJs all day long. These have the opening in the back too, so no excuses. [#Legal]
PlayStation®Home是其中一個依然接受並鼓勵你一整天穿著睡衣的地方。背部也有開口，所以沒有籍口了。 [#Legal]
PlayStation®Home是其中一個依然接受並鼓勵你一整天穿著睡衣的地方。背部也有開口，所以沒有籍口了。 [#Legal]
PlayStation®Home is one of the last safe havens where it's acceptable and encouraged to wear your PJs all day long. These have the opening in the back too, so no excuses. [#Legal]
